title: India eyes 100 GW nuclear power by 2047: AEC chairman
description: India aims to increase its nuclear power production to 1 lakh MW by 2047, a significant jump from the current 8,000 MW. This goal was highlighted by Atomic Energy Commission Chairman A K Mohanty at the release of a report on energy transitions. The report emphasized the need for nuclear power in India's energy transition, suggesting that it would require infrastructure for alternative sources like nuclear, flexible grid infrastructure, and storage to phase down coal usage.
